dmca.title: Google Image DMCA - Beijingtrip
dmca.body:
ATTN: Google, Inc.
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA
Fax: (650) 963-3255

FROM: Catherine He
Travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
Suite 513Yu Yuan Mansion,
No.65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan,
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.
Tel: (86-29) 8523 6688 Ext. 207
Fax: (86-29) 8539 7349
E-mail: edit@travelchinaguide.com

SUBJ: Copyright infringement
PAGE: 6
DATE: February 14, 2007
Sent via: Fax&email

Dear Google, Inc.

1. I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our
company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your
concerns about the website copied the below images from our website.

The offender is www.muztagh.com. They copied 34 images from our website
without our permission. So we are here to ask for your investigation and
removal of the infringing images from your Image Search.

2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from
our website:

(1) Our Copyrighted Image:
www.travelchinaguide.com/images/photogallery/0007500/dali%20china%2010007455
tm.jpg

www.muztagh.com/images/three-pagodas.jpg

3. My contact information:
Catherine He
edit@travelchinaguide.com
www.travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
Suite 513, Yu Yuan Mansion,
No.65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan,
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.

4. The contact info of the copyright offender www.muztagh.com is:
Email: info@muztagh.net
Tel:
86-991-8522688
Fax:
86-991-8555699

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web page is not authorized by
the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.

Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,

Catherine He
